name: Barrel Full of Monkeys
description:
Run from monkeys, hold onto ammo, and search for an exit! Can you escape the maze?

Featuring music by Crispysteve42and all original art by Vermiculus Ensemble Barrel Full of Monkeys (BFOM) is a simple little maze running game that marks Greenest Pastures first entering the market.
The project will be updated and patched with more content, and future releases in the series will serve as a 'simpler setting' to test and define features for other titles.
